CFItemURI.fullstatement: Articulate strategies for querying and generating reports from health information system databases

CFRubricCriterion.Description:
Identify a performance improvement issue
within a health care organization that needs
improvement and provide its relevant
 background information

CFRubricCriterionLevels.Description: Does not identify a performance improvement issue within a health care organization that needs improvement and does not provide relevant background information.
Outlines a performance improvement issue within a health care organization that needs improvement and provides some relevant background information.
Identifies a performance improvement issue within a health care organization that needs improvement and provides its relevant background information.

Identifies a performance improvement issue within a health care organization that needs improvement, and provides its relevant background information and identifies criteria that could be used to evaluate the issue

CFItemURI.fullstatement: Articulate strategies for querying and generating reports from health information system databases

CFRubricCriterion.Description: Provide solid and relevant reasons for why a performance improvement problem is an issue worth fixing in a health care organization.

CFRubricCriterionLevels.Description: Does not provide solid and relevant reasons for why a performance improvement problem is an issue worth fixing in a health care organization.
Outlines some basic reasons for why a performance improvement problem is an issue worth fixing in a health care organization.
Provides solid and relevant reasons for why a performance improvement problem is an issue worth fixing in a health care organization.
Provides solid and relevant reasons for why a performance improvement problem is an issue worth fixing in a health care organization and identifies assumptions on which the analysis is based.

CFItemURI.fullstatement: Create various data representation methods for reporting and professional communications

CFRubricCriterion.Description: Use raw data and data representation method to show how data helps justify the need to fix a performance improvement issue in a health care organization

CFRubricCriterionLevels.Description: Does not use raw data and data representation method to show how data helps justify the need to fix a performance improvement issue in a health care organization.

Recognizes how raw data and data representation method could show how data helps justify the need to fix a performance improvement issue in a health care organization, but does not accurately use that information.
Uses raw data and data representation method to show how data helps justify the need to fix a performance improvement issue in a health care organization

Uses raw data and data representation method to show how data helps justify the need to fix a performance improvement issue in a health care organization and evaluates the relevance, currency, sufficiency, and trustworthiness of the evidence.

CFItemURI.fullstatement: Communicate as a practitioner-scholar, consistent with the expectations of a nursing professional

CFRubricCriterion.Description: Write clearly and logically with correct use of spelling, grammar, punctuation and mechanicsÍ¾ and correctly format citations using APA style

CFRubricCriterionLevels.Description: Does not write clearly and logicallyÍ¾ writing shows little attention to spelling, grammar, punctuation, and mechanicsÍ¾ and does not correctly format citations using APA style

Uses sentence structure that is mostly clear with a few minor spelling or grammatical errorsÍ¾ but fails to attribute quotes and citations in a few places, or allows some inconsistencies in APA style.
Writes clearly and logically with correct use of spelling, grammar, punctuation, and mechanicsÍ¾ and formats citations correctly using APA style.

Writes clearly and logically with correct use of spelling, grammar, punctuation, and mechanics with no errorsÍ¾ formats citations correctly using APA styleÍ¾ and all information is accurate and uptodate.
